subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Nacer Bouhanni of France won a windy eighth stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alejandro Valverde kept the overall leader’s red jersey.
snippet: Nacer Bouhanni of France won a windy eighth stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alejandro Valverde kept the overall leader’s red jersey.
